abstract: Editorial commends Europe's leaders for their financial rescue plan for Greek debt but says Europe is only grappling with financial symptoms of deepening crisis, not its underlying causes; warns without authorizing European Central Bank to act as a lender of last resort, Europe's crisis will continue and threaten American economy and global recovery.
snippet: Europe’s leaders are only grappling with the financial symptoms of the deepening crisis, not its underlying causes.
lead_paragraph: Europe’s leaders are only grappling with the financial symptoms of the deepening crisis, not its underlying causes.
